title: [高悬赏加急]服务器有几个大客户进不去！！
author: AK_shen
txt_content:
An exceptionCaught() event was fired, and it reached at the tail of the pipeline. It usually means the last handler in the pipeline did not handle the exception.
07.02 19:59:56 [Server] INFO java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException复制代码
服务器开着，但是有几个玩家就是进不去，
这是后台消息截取的一段，
感觉像是这个，帮我看一下吧，非常感谢！
